name: Scions of Fate
description: Scion of Fate Online, one of the top MMORPG game in the history, now available on Steam.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP, Vista Processor: PentiumIII 800MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: ATI RADEON, Nvidia TNT2, MATROX Milenium G400 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7, Windowns8, Windows10 Processor: PentiumIV 1.4MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: ATI RADEON 9000, Nvidia Geforce 4 FX Storage: 10 GB available space
